channel.title: Pages on Ran Zhuoheng (Steven)
channel.description: Recent content in Pages on Ran Zhuoheng (Steven)

item.title: Excellence Research
item.description:
I am currently pursuing my postgraduate research at the University of Southampton’s School of Electronics and Computer Science(ECS), which is 1st in the UK for Electrical and Electronic Engineering. My supervisor is Dr. Basel Halak, who is the director of the embedded systems and IoT program.

My research interests include including:

  • IoT and Hardware Security
  • Embedded and Wearable Device
  • Digital System Design Using FPGA

I think the world will need more IoT-based smart devices in the future, and they may be constrained by power consumption and size. And security will be the biggest issue for such devices in the background of the technology that has been fully developed.

Learn more and contribute on GitHub.

item.title: About

I think the world will need more IoT-based smart devices in the future, and they may be constrained by power consumption and size. And security will be the biggest issue for such devices in the background of the technology that has been fully developed.
